title: [Suggestion] Please New Report System - Intentional Feeding
body:
Hey everyone,
Players that intentionally feed or throw ranked games because they are tilted are very annoying - especially at lower ELO's. Can Riot please work on a new way they analyse intentional feeding reports? I just had a game that had a Tahm Kench (for no reason whatsoever) just steal our junglers camps and then go AFK, (he took smite, he didn't say anything at all in champ select.) His username is: [removed - no reporting other players] and is on OCE. This is very annoying as it wasn't even justifiable to go AFK over, he said nothing before he went AFK and we said nothing to him, he threw a ranked game that all the players should've had a chance in. Thanks all.

Link: In the link it is the screenshot of CS. Teemo was our jungler and you can see where Tahm stops stealing his camps because it hits a big spike. Very annoying.
